commit.message:
Make-lang.in: Update dependencies.

	* gcc-interface/Make-lang.in: Update dependencies.
	* gcc-interface/lang.opt: New language AdaSCIL.
	* gcc-interface/lang-specs.h: Add specs for adascil language.

From-SVN: r194216
